actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 to exempt from its coverage persons engaged in activities within a 50-mile intrastate radius of their permanent place of residence and for not more than 26 weeks.

summary.text: Exempts from coverage under the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 any persons who engage in farm labor contracting within a 50-mile (currently, a 25-mile) radius of their permanent place of residence and for not more than 26 (currently, 13) weeks.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 to exempt from its coverage persons engaged in activities within a 50-mile intrastate radius of their permanent place of residence and for not more than 26 weeks.
